1622150.name: RPG Maker MZ - The Adventurer’s Journey II
1622150.description:
Your exciting adventure continues!

The Adventurer's Journey II Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that will surely give your games some new ambiance! Everything from Egypt to Japan and back again!

This pack contains:
  • 20 Orchestrated Tracks
  • Looped OGG, M4A Vorbis files
  • The MP3 version of the tracks are also included
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1622150.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
